website_summaries.verdict: The $180 Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 is a fine choice for a budget tablet, but it's ultimately bested by great older devices, and new slates that are cheaper still.
pros: The Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 delivers satisfying performance for web browsing and casual gaming, and has a pretty good screen, for just $180
cons: That budget price is now matched by superior devices like the Nexus 7
You'll want to invest in a microSD card

website_summaries.verdict: The Galaxy Tab 4 7.0 will appeal to longtime Samsung fans, but it doesn't do enough to justify the premium over similarly equipped competitors.

customer_reviews.title: 8gb memory with preinstalled 4gb of crap
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge, and I mean huge Samsung fan but I have to say these are an epic fail. I understand it's an 8 gb but it comes with almost 4gb worth of stuff already usin it up! And the fact that apps need to be downloaded to the internal memory and not the extra SD card, it is absolutely useless. My kids have maybe a total of 8 games which two can never update cause there's not enough space. I mean come on, either make it so the SD card can be mainly used or don't gunk up the device with all that crap.
customer_reviews.author: E kim

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't get through a day without it.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tablet since July of 2016 and have no complaints. I use it every day, all day long as I'm a voracious reader of the books that I download from Kindle. Additionally I have hundreds of books on the mini SD card. I also use it read emails, check weather, listen to Simple Radio, and Facebook. For me the 7" screen is perfect; easy to hold and fits in my purse. The only thing that I wish I could do is to update the version of Android but I've not figured out how to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great budget (not cheapo mark off type) tablet!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome tablet. We have had it for over a year and have had no issues. It has taken a beaten (thank you 5 year old) and still keeps going perfectly fine though admittedly its always in its. This is a budget tablet (albeit not the cheapo mark off type), but it still runs fine as long as you don't expect Ipad like quickness. It does have a slot for micro SD cards which opens things up for adding movies, pictures, etc. Definitely a big selling point for us (I put all our purchased movies here so the kiddo could have easier access to them). We would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: hiowatha

customer_reviews.title: Its a pretty crappy tablet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this quite a while ago and I must say, the battery life is pathetic. The thing does not hold a charge at all. If I didnt already have a positive experience with a Samsung phone, judging by this tablet, I would never buy another Samsung product, it's that bad. After a month it just became a paper weight that collects dust as its not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Kish

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase, still works good 4yrs later
customer_reviews.text: I've used this tablet now for about 4 years now. Camera quality is mediocre, screen quality is great, battery life is decent, memory sucks but that's why it has sd card slot. Cons: tablet apps are poorly updated, has started freezing here in the past month, I thinks due to my kids taking 1000s of pictures. All in all great buy
customer_reviews.author: Bill nie the science guy

customer_reviews.title: Stuck On KitKat Forever With WiFi Version
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this tablet and Samsung. I purchased this two years ago and have never received a firmware update. I have the wifi version and it has Android 4.4.2 which isn't supported by more and more apps. Additionally, this version of Android makes it impossible to fully utilize the nice new SD card I bought for it. It's also loaded with bloatware so I have to manually free up space on it. It's basically been an ebook reader. I regret this purchase and do not recommend this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: JustS

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet. I had one previously for about 4yrs. Never a problem. It took a lickin from my toddler grandson and still worked wonderfully. Unfortunately it didn't survive a drop down a flight of concrete stairs. So I purchased another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Complete garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Abysmally slow and unresponsive. It's okay for watching something on Hulu or Netflix at the lowest resolution possible, but absolute garbage at running any other apps. For example, when I use the World of Warcraft: Legion app, I have to wait 3-10 seconds for it to recognize each tap on the screen. If I hit the back button once while browsing an internet page, I might wait 15 seconds with nothing happening, then suddenly find myself several pages back. I use the Amazon Underground Actually Free Mahjong game, and it takes 2-5 seconds to register each tap there. My husband got the Nvidia tablet. I wish I had done the same.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla Williams

customer_reviews.title: but after buying a smart watch and the need to sync it to android
customer_reviews.text: My wife is an Apple lover and has the I Pad 3. I always preferred conventional laptops and desktops, but after buying a smart watch and the need to sync it to android, I decided to invest in the Samsung Galaxy 4. Wow, this thing rocks for the money. It is quicker loading than the Apple and much easier to use the buttons that have a bigger sweet spot when pushing and it is much faster loading apps! I can't say enough good things about it. It holds a charge for a long time and is simply a wonderful tablet for the money and in my estimation is a much better deal than the Apple I Pad.
customer_reviews.author: coolnout

customer_reviews.title: Used?
customer_reviews.text: It is in immaculate condition. I bought it as a gift for my daughter and she doesn't put it down that often. The battery keeps a good charge. I have no complaints. Excellent tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Circa 1968

customer_reviews.title: Definitely one of the better brands of tablets
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great tablet. We've purchased a couple as gifts for our children and they love them. These are definitely an improvement over the 3's which didn't seem made to last. We do however the Galaxy tabs so we decided to give them another chance with the Tab 4. We've had one for 8 months and the second for 4 months and have had no problems whatsoever. They are handled by a twelve and four year old and they've been holding up very well. I've been thinking of purchasing another for myself because I like that they're good quality tablets but are more affordable than their competitor.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy J

customer_reviews.title: Wifi connectivity needs help.
customer_reviews.text: The size is great for carrying around in my bag. I wish I had gotten the one with more memory, even with the sd card for added memory, it doesn't hold many apps. My biggest complaint, though, is that it doesnt want to stay connected to WiFi, so when the apps go through automatic updates, they frequently fail, and it has a hard time connecting to Netflix and Amazon prime video.
customer_reviews.author: LauraD

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: I had to come back and update my review. This is JUNK. The antenna is so bad you can't stream anything even when you're close to your connection. I think I should pay more attention to the lower review than the higher. It crashes - A LOT. Can't modify the location for your music app that's included with the tablet to point to your SD. You can't move your files to where the music app is. What's the purpose of that? There'll be more and I'm thinking the 3 will go down to 2. Yep. That just happened. Might as well use it for a door stop. 2 to a 1. Absolute worst electronic device I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Memory - or lack thereof.
customer_reviews.text: Pro - love the size, response, clarity, controls, available apps, weight - all of that is better than expected. Cons - enough to cost stars!!! - factory loaded junk apps that eat up so much memory that it is frustrating! Even with a 32 gig SD card, it is frustrating. these cannot be removed unless the owner holds a degree in IT. Why in the world a vendor would require the purchaser to carry such a load of useless bits is beyond me. It is so frustrating that my next tablet will be determined by what is NOT included in memory-eating, useless-to-me factory-installed apps.
customer_reviews.author: D G B

customer_reviews.title: Rave reviews wrong
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 Samsung Galaxy Tab 4s. One for my daughter. One for my son. My daughter's broke after 4 months. My son's broke after 5 months. Both were carefully taken care of and used only in protective cases. Both "died" from the same problem: inability to hold a charge or turn on. No internet fixes worked. Used different chargers, Samsung only chargers, cleaned protective port, etc. Nothing worked. Just randomly failed to turn on one day. A HUGE WASTE.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda T

customer_reviews.title: More expensive than it was in 2015. Paying more for no product support
customer_reviews.text: My son has had this tablet going on 3 years. We've always had trouble with memory, even though I bought a big microsd card, not everything can be stored on it. It survived his rough and tumble life and managed to work fine for a child without the firmware updates. However as I am looking for a new tablet I see this dinosaur of a tablet cost more now than when I bought it in 2015. With low memory and a cutoff of no more updates. That adds up into low review.
customer_reviews.author: Candiiswhite

customer_reviews.title: It's alright.
customer_reviews.text: If you're strapped for cash and simply cannot afford an iPad mini, get this. Bottom line, it's okay. I have apple devices and had a android device a couple years ago. I was hoping time had improved things, but it's just the same: apps crash, it forgets the network connection, and the operating system is not as stable as apple. I bought this to watch TV and movies, but unfortunately, and this isn't android's fault, but some TV channels just don't maintain their android apps like they do for apple. Basically, I feel like I got my money's worth (especially if you buy one refurbished), but my next tablet purchase I'll just save a little more and stick with apple.
customer_reviews.author: Chester Copperpot

customer_reviews.title: Interface is seemless for Samsung phone users
customer_reviews.text: All members of our family have used this frequently for the 10 months we've had it. We've had 4 kids from ages 3 to 10 use it without needing help navigating. I highly recommend this if you have a Samsung Galaxy phone. You'll immediately be at home with the interface. Get a supplemental memory card. My only difficulty is telling the tablet to install applications directly to the memory card instead of the device. I end up installing to the device, and then transferring to the memory card.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: A decent Android device
customer_reviews.text: I never owned an Android tablet before, only iPads that cost much more. This tablet is quite nice. A bit heavier than it should be given the screen size, and notably slower than my iPad, but still, with a beautiful and big enough screen, a solid feel, and a good price. It doesn't compare to an iPad, but then it shouldn't. I just wish the Android platform was more robust. Even the gmail has fewer features than gmail on my iPad.... And since this is a Google device, that just doesn't make sense to me. Oh well. It's functional enough.
customer_reviews.author: Haf

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tablet as a means of seeing "First Person View" while flying a quadcopter. Before I even tried that purpose, I noticed that this thing is SLOW to respond to any input from the screen. I'm talking 1 to 2 second latency, which is entirely unacceptable. For comparison purposes, I own a 2.5-year-old Kindle Fire HDX. Despite its age, the Kindle responds instantly to inputs from the screen, as any tablet should. A brand-new tablet should not respond so slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Small but perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my Mom. She has never used a computer in her life except for her smartphone and she is now in her upper 60's. I wanted to get her something that was good quality but not overwhelming. This tablet is perfect. I showed her how to use it a few times and now I can't even get her to put it down. Works great for her. She loves the pictures it takes and how small it is but how large the screen can be so she can see with great clear pictures. I'm so glad I decided to get this for her.
customer_reviews.author: Cidney

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this tab
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet. I got it as a gift from my husband. He has one and I have never owned a tablet. Didn't think I need one until I was given this. Now I do so much on it. It has a front and rear camera and the only downside is that it does not have a built in flash. So photos indoors and in poor lighting come out bad. The outdoor photos in day light are phenomenal. The colors and vibrancy is fantastic. Sound quality is excellent. I honestly don't have any complaints. Just been very happily enjoying my tablet.
customer_reviews.author: LB2309Z

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tablet!! You want it!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is perfect. Great price, nice feel when scrolling around. Very smooth, great resolution, takes decent pictures. Sleek look. 5 months in and still feels brand new! I've never owned a tablet, but this one feels a lot like my iPhone, and even the droid phones I've had previously. So whichever you're usually into you won't be disappointed. (I bought 3 of those cheap-o Dragon tablets you may be debating on- they're all already broken. Trust me you don't want to buy one of those!!!) If you're looking for a really nice tablet at a great price go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: I'm one happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tablet. I already own a Galaxy Tab 4 10 inch, but wanted something smaller that I could tuck into my purse. This is really ideal. It synced beautifully with my other Galaxy and I'm pleased with the screen clarity, ease of use, and speed. My chief complaint with both tablets is that I cannot move storage-gobbling apps like Next Issue onto the SD card, so I have to be careful not to download too many magazines at the same time. Chose this over the Kindle Fire because of SD card slot and availability of well-liked apps.
customer_reviews.author: Colonial shopper

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing and I found the size to be perfect for holding and using my thumbs to navigate and ...
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically pleasing and I found the size to be perfect for holding and using my thumbs to navigate and play games which has always been my preference. After updating seemed to have a slight delay but otherwise was responsive when navigating and opening applications. Had trouble running flash games such as Clash of Clans etc, without delay. I guess not bad for the price tag but returning nonetheless for something that runs a little smoother [and costs a little more]. The amount of bloatware was incredible as warned and expected. Still unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M.

customer_reviews.title: So Good I bought it again.
customer_reviews.text: This is the Second time I have purchased the exact same tablet. The initial purchase was a year prior. The product is very good for every day around the home use. The size and weight make it possible to hold and use with one hand if needed. The screen is large enough for viewing medium sized videos or for internet browsing. If you wanted to read non mobile websites, you will find yourself zooming in to read text. App based sites or mobile friendly websites are preferred as the screen is only 7 inches. I find the tablet fills the gap between desktop or laptop devices and Cellphones.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Jacks

customer_reviews.title: This makes your added micro sdcard almost useless. This appears to be a problem with ALL ...
customer_reviews.text: It is the essential Samsung tablet. Only problem noted is due to android Kit-Kat not allowing apps access to external sd card. You can quickly run out of room on the internal memory if you use Amazon prime music and or gps map apps.... Copilot etc... This makes your added micro sdcard almost useless. This appears to be a problem with ALL Kit-Kat devices and hopefully they will fix it soon. Perhaps Google is trying to hobble the competition to the standard of the No external memory Nexus.
customer_reviews.author: Old Vet

customer_reviews.title: Little Memory and Slow
customer_reviews.text: 8 gb of memory goes fast. That's not Samsung's fault, and they don't hide the fact that it's an 8 gb device. But the bloat ware on the device that can neither be deleted nor moved to SD card is Samsung's fault, and they certainly don't warn you about it. Can't give it more than 3 stars even though all else works very nicely. Update. Slow. It is slow. Wow, is it slow. This device is very very slow. Dropped rating to two stars.
customer_reviews.author: andyoctober

customer_reviews.title: I had the Tab 3 and wanted to ''upgrade'' to ...
customer_reviews.text: I had the Tab 3 and wanted to ''upgrade'' to this tab 4,,, used it for 3 weeks and then it just DIED !!!! It was in sleep mode for 2 hours and when I came back it just didn't turn on,,,,,,, no button combination will wake it up and doesn't even charge, and nothing in the custumer service can be done,, so now I have to send it to USA to SAMSUNG to get it fixed, otherwise I have to pay for it in some technician here in Mexico and it will cost me almost the same Price of what I PAID !!!
customer_reviews.author: Valeo

customer_reviews.title: I liked all the positive reviews but
customer_reviews.text: Well, I liked all the positive reviews but, I did read some of the reviews that said the Galaxy stopped charging after a short period. Sure enough, 32 days of mild usage and blame....nothing when plugged is. Tried different chargers, still nothing. The problem is in the connection port. Fortunatly for me, I was right at the last day for returns through Amazon. What perfect customer service! Refund went quick and I send the Galaxy back...... but I do wonder what would've happened had it broke a week later.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I can't give this a 5 star because I got too used to looking at my Nexus 7 and I can notice a difference in the brightness and sharpness of the screen. The Nexus 7 screen looks slightly sharper and brighter and of course more responsive but one of the biggest thing the Nexus 7 is missing is a simple Micro SD slot. If the Galaxy Tab came with a comparable screen, this would be a five star review but aside from the minor complaints, once you get used to looking at the screen, you'll love this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: SpectralFlame

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet, it has worked perfectly fine since I bought it. This model is missing two things that could make it one of the best of the market and those are the light sensor that changes the brightness according to the lightning around you and the other one is a better camera. It takes pictures just find in perfectly lit areas but as soon as that is changed the picture quality decreases drastically. These two are not must features for me but could have made it even better. Other than those two it is a great tablet!
customer_reviews.author: Alfher

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life is outstanding, tablet works great for light use.
customer_reviews.text: Use this tablet very often for basic browsing and some light work (Microsoft word, Onedrive, Adobe Reader, Excel and Google Slides). It works great, however it lags a bit when under heavy use. The processor is not the greatest, however for basic use, this may be perfect for you. I would definitely recommend for someone looking for a tablet to use for light work and light gaming. The tablet is light, never gets hot and the battery life is OUTSTANDING, probably the best feature of this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Ann G

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 7inch
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tablet. I have gone from the 2 the 3 and now the 4. It just works and is fast. The screen is crystal clear and it has no lag. If you like android, this is a great choice, easy to use, and it works so well. Plays any app from the play store which is a big plus. So if you want something stable, fast, a good picture, and above average performance you will like this tablet. You can get Kies, which is a management program so you can add, delete and synce to all your devices. Made for the Samsung. Nice program. Get it at Samsung site.
customer_reviews.author: Big Reader

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected considering the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet for my daughter coming from an iPad lover. Very affordable and works well for what she needs it for. Love the fact that a 32G micro SD card can be inserted for more memory. Picture and video quality is ok. It is lightweight and can be stowed away easily in a small purse, bag, backpack, etc. (with a protective case) being the convenient size that it is. Was delivered on time and packaged well. Would buy again from seller.
customer_reviews.author: Lightfighter A 3/27

customer_reviews.title: Great little on the go tablet
customer_reviews.text: I got this tablet to use for reading ebooks and quick browsing. I received the 10" Galaxy for Christmas and love it, but it's just too large and awkward for reading, especially being used to the original Nexus 7 tablet. This one is a perfect reader, browser, and on the go work tablet that I can slip in my purse. For serious browsing or watching Netflix it can be a bit laggy but I think that it would be fine if it was my only tablet...I'm just spoiled knowing I have my more powerful one to play with :)
customer_reviews.author: grrltechie

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I got this tablet as a Christmas gift for my brother. When it first arrived the screen and box it came in were damaged. Amazon replaced the tablet within 3 days. This was a great gift that he loves. It's very sleek and thin, with a good grip on the sides and back which makes it easy to hold in one hand. The display is clear and bright, and the battery life was much better than I had expected. It lasted nearly the entire day with him using it constantly. Really a great item and makes an easy gift for a hard to buy for brother.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Castleberry

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE my new tablet
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE my new tablet! It is basically just a larger version of my Galaxy S5 phone so it is easy to use and even though it is only 8GB, I can always have the option of using an SD card to give it more space. I am not real tech savy so I can't answer any questions about anything technical but it seems to be a great tablet. I love the android products and would definitely recommend it. Shipping was also very quick and i received it well before the expected delivery date!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Pullam

customer_reviews.title: Great for an adult, but has no parental control options for child use
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Galaxy Tab for my son, who is 9 and has autism. He likes the tablet, but as a parent, I"m not a huge fan of this. It has been hard for me to set parental controls on this. We also own Kindle Fire Tablets and I have found them to be more "parent friendly". As an adult, I would give this product five stars because it really is a quality tablet with easy to use features. As a parent, though, I knocked a star off because it is hard to set limitations for this device.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy again unless I bought a 16GB+ model
customer_reviews.text: I generally really like Samsung gear and Android products. I purchased this for one of my children and spend a lot of time deleting games in order for her to add new ones due to the 8GB of storage (less usable due to the Operating System). It does allow for an external memory card. However, many games do not allow you to store the apps on the external card. Main problem is that the device memory is only 8GB. That is a huge painpoint for this otherwise great device. This is why I cannot give this above a 2.
customer_reviews.author: anix

customer_reviews.title: This Tablet is a Hit.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 (7.0). I love the way it feels and I am very impressed with the battery life. It has been very reliable and the processor speed is quite fast. I also enjoy the countless number of apps available to me through the Google store. I continuously use it for keeping track of the time and temperature as well as picking up my emails. This model is not too big yet it is easy on the eyes too. I am so happy I decided to purchase this wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Plcmore1

customer_reviews.title: I like have the option to use Android apps versus the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first android tablet as I have only used an iPhone and Kindle previously. This little device is plenty powerful and once I got over my learning curve very convenient to use. I like have the option to use Android apps versus the other apps for my existing devices. My Kindle is great but my partner is constantly using it so I had to get another toy for me. This one works very nicely for surfing the web, using Facebook, playing games and reading e-books.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: I've had these for about 8 months and they have ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for about 8 months and they have trouble holding charge. They also do not register that they're fully charge so we will have to re-start to get them to indicate the accurate battery level. The screens are a little finicky too. 8GB is not enough if you will have a lot of games stored on the device. We bought two for my kids and even with upgrading their SD card to 32gb, it doesn't open up much space on the actual device.
customer_reviews.author: AmySmith1920

customer_reviews.title: Not an Ipad Mini
customer_reviews.text: Its not an IPAD in any means. Definitely a little slower/clunkier. But I still love it. Its a great price, and I love that you can have multiple use accounts/logins. Works great for my business where I manage several Instagram accounts. It could never replace what my IPAD MINI does, but it does things that my IPAD MINI cannot do. I was a little disappointed in the split screen functionality since it seems to only work with select apps, but its not that big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet for school
customer_reviews.text: I love samsung products so I had high expectations for this one. I bought it to take notes on at school since my laptop was pretty heavy. I ended up also using it for homework, but it will not load some homework websites. The battery life is pretty decent. I charge it every two days or so at school and every week at home. I also only use this for school so there's no games... which is why the battery life is so good. I would highly recommend this product :D
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tablet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girl for valentines she absolutely loves if the touch and resolution are amazing The camera sucks if your wanting it for pics But it's definitely nice at the price point If you want something great for surfing the web streaming music and video and some light gaming this is good to go The touch seems better than my iPhone or iPad I liked it so much I bought another for myself
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Love Samsung Tablets! The only brand I completely trust 100%!
customer_reviews.text: Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 is fantastic! It is the 3rd one I have purchased (2 were gifts to family members). It did arrive on time. I purchased on a Monday and by Friday had not received a status from the seller (I purchase from Amazon often and always receive a status from the seller within a couple of days. When I did reach out to seller, they promptly replied that the item was on backorder for 3 weeks. However, I received the item as originally dated that I would. So a little confusing. But overall was a good experience. Great product received on time.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: It has enough memory for two or three of the games I like, a lot of apps that I didn't expect ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect this much power from such an inexpensive tablet. It has enough memory for two or three of the games I like, a lot of apps that I didn't expect to be able to use, like creating and printing documents (not with the Hancom pre-installed software, I disabled that and got a better one). The screen is great. If you're tablet shopping, take a look at this one. It's actually better than its sale descriptions. I expected to pay double this price for this much capability.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C

customer_reviews.title: A Very Nice Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love my new toy.I had a 10" tablet which turned out to be a bit clumsy and big at times.This 7" Tab 4 is a perfect fit.I plan on using it on some road trips I`m going to take.It should easily fit in my glove box. The performance is great.A very responsive tablet.The screen is plenty big enough to see.So when I can use it over my smart phone it`s a nice improvement.I did buy a 32GB card for $17 to expand the storage which is a must.
customer_reviews.author: freebird

customer_reviews.title: This tablet is a good buy for those who need something bigger than a ...
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is a good buy for those who need something bigger than a small cell phone screen but not as large as a laptop for leisure use. I do not like the fact that there are so much hardwired google app stuff, 75% of it I do not use and have just space being taken up on my tablet for apps I do not want, and can't get rid of. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: King of tablets
customer_reviews.text: Before this I had the galaxy tab 3 and it did the job wonderfully. However, when I switched to tab 4 I was impressed with the quality of the image. You can clearly tell the difference between tab 3 and tab 4 screens. The sound on this beast is good, but it could be better compared to other tablets out in the market. The only thing I don’t like is the plastic back on this galaxy tab 4. It makes it feel cheap. Great camera that works like a charm each time I need to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Damian Marynski

customer_reviews.title: best tablet value!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet! Great size and proportion for surfing the Web or reading (particularly for comics!). Excellent resolution and processing speed. Only minor draw back seems to be the battery life, but that may just be the apps I use. Highly recommended this tablet! If you're on a budget, it's worth paying a few extra dollars on the galaxy, the hardware is very well supported (on cheaper tablets from various brands not all apps will work as well as they do on this one).
customer_reviews.author: A Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and has performed as advertised. This is a great tablet! This is my first experience with an Android OS. I'm an iOS person. The screen resolution is great and the response-time is exceptional. I love the fact that you can increase the tablet's memory my adding a memory card. I purchased the 32GB memory card which will be more than enough for me! I am very impressed with the performance of this device. I would highly recommend it for anyone considering a low-priced, quality tablet!
customer_reviews.author: Ruffcrew3

customer_reviews.title: Great Tab for the money
customer_reviews.text: I love all Samsung products but Amazon had this Tab4 on sale and were able to match their competition price allowing me to purchase this unit with great peace of mind. Amazon was great to deal with and delivered the unit within 2 days as promised. Going back to the tablet, I highly recommend getting one, it will make you life easier and wont hurt your budget. Battery life is good, the software is user friendly and the only draw back is the quality of the frame and material used
customer_reviews.author: Hanson Webb

customer_reviews.title: 3.5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like my new tablet with a few reservations... it gets VERY hot after a few rounds of sudoku... uncomfortable for my hand to hold it. I like that it is thin and lighter in weight than my old tablet, but i don't think it's battery life is as good. There are some games that won't work with it because it doesn't have a menu button. Does not actually communicate with my Samsung Smart TV which was why i chose a Samsung. So it goes. It's a perfectly ok small tablet for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazin Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... watchmovies and tv shows with Netflix and other apps like that. I have a galaxy phone
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to connect to my tv to watchmovies and tv shows with Netflix and other apps like that. I have a galaxy phone, always have, so it was a no brainer to get the Samsung tablet. And the price made it an even better deal. So far so good, interface is very similar to my phone, so it was very easy to find my way around. Samsung is hands down always the way to go. There is so much more you can do than with Apple
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M. Boccuzzo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great got it for my 7 year old. He watches movie, plays games, watches YouTube and talks to family from Apps on it. It's perfect for his needs. Dare I say it's as good as an IPAD. Of course I'm not talking about the bells and whistles (quality and capability) I'm saying, for a young child it's just as good. The only difference is the IPAD is bigger.
customer_reviews.author: H.T

customer_reviews.title: great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I received my case and it had some factory defects, when I spoke with the customer service rep they immediately sent a replacement item and even allowed me to choose a different color because the color was different than what was described, this happens because of screen resolutions etc. When I received my new case it was completely free of defects and worked very well. I like the magnet closure and that it protected my tablet without being bulky. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a thin case to protect their tablet. i would definitely purchase another item from this company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a senior who is not into high technology.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my husband and because we are "seniors" wanted it to be easy to understand and use. So far my husband is very pleased with this tablet and it is fine for his purposes of streaming baseball games, playing games, and reading books.
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: Slow, Buggy and Wifi Issues.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the size of the tablet and screen quality, but that's all. Tablet would not stay connected to Wifi. Kept dropping connection and I always had to keep hitting Retry when the blank screen would appear. Tried connection on 4 other Wifi sources, to rule out my router, and the same thing would happen. Tablet would also freeze at times forcing me to reset the device to get it to work again. Mine was very sluggish, slow to respond and overall buggy. Sent back for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Road1

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet, easy to use, watch any movie, play cool games, educational games, beautifully bright colored screen. I have 5 samsung tablets and also have samsung phones, I love them all. Best out there in my oppinion, I have had others but this is my favorite because you can put a memory chip in it, and sync it to my phones photos. automatically backs them up to one another, if you sign in and set settings that way.
customer_reviews.author: Kasandra Farley

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet ever!! Best Samsung product!!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is the best tablet I have ever had. I have owned the nexus 7 and the kindle hd fire but nothing can top this tablet. It's even better if you have a Samsung phone, which I do. This tablet has great speed and maintains it. It's reliable and after buying it I bought an added 64gb memory card just to make it even better and it didn't cost me much. This tablet is honestly affordable for what you get out of it and it fits in your hand nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Freya

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 (7.0) was a Christmas gift for my wife & she loves it. Great features , sufficient onboard storage (8 GB) with the ability to add a 32 GB SD card (in which I did) for more room to store music , pictures , etc. With Google Maps installed , the Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 can also be used as a GPS device as well. This can also be used with a Bluetooth keyboard as well. A great tablet for the money !!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzmaster

customer_reviews.title: Very good device for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very good device for the money. The GPS receiver is quick to find my location. Wifi connectivity is good, and I find that I can watch the occasional youtube video without issue, though I do sometimes see some "interlacing effects". The brightness has to be set to the maximum to view it outside. The kids are also able to run their DS games under the emulator (downloaded app) just fine. I was also able to add a 64GB micro USB card!
customer_reviews.author: P. Phirrup

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Good buy. Great product. Bought it for my son when he was 2. It lasted a few years so no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: shey love

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with this Tab. It does everything I want it to do and I really like the Samsung Link capability that allows me to move files, documents, and music between my Samsung Galaxy S4 and laptop with ease in any wi-fi zone. With the 64GB media card I won't run out of space for photos and documents for a long time. It is compatible with my bluetooth keyboard so that I can work on my novels while commuting on public transit.
customer_reviews.author: Novelist

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size to use to read in bed. Not heavy or bulky. Small size makes it easy to take along without taking up too much room. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia G. Louden

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet I have had by far
customer_reviews.text: I love my tablet! I have had it for 5 and a half months now and have not had any issues with it. The display is very vivid (more vivid than any device I have had). It is also extremely durable. I have dropped it outside (face down) without the case a few times and the screen did not have a single scratch! I would recommend this tablet to anyone looking for a quality tablet for an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Present for mums 70Th birthday
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mum as a present she hasn't seen it yet so unable to comment if she can use it. I am used to another make of tablet so I did need to play around abit setting this up for her. But it was mostly straight forward. I did download the kindle app and the skype app which was easy. I eventually got the hang of it. I am sure my mum will learn how to use it too, but she will probably only use it for a few things ie; kindle, skype, pictures
customer_reviews.author: Jooles

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy 4 is a fine piece of hardware
customer_reviews.text: Samsung Galaxy 4 is a fine piece of hardware. The problem I ran in to was, with the software. I thought it was very confrontational. Asking to many questions. I think they should tell you how much trouble you'll get in to up front ( you can use the device with out agreeing to all the software ) or We what you whole life and credit card number and we will give you the device for free which is what I think they should do. Data mining and demographic studies, are VERY Valuable.
customer_reviews.author: Arthure

customer_reviews.title: Granny's Favorite Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I'm 60 years old and not a pro with computers but found this very easy to set up. I never even had to open the cute little manual that comes with it. It was packaged very nice. I am thrilled that I can download games from Google Play. I couldn't do that with the tablet I bought on Black Friday. I highly recommend this tablet. It's really great.
customer_reviews.author: The Dog ZooTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Second one not charging after one year use
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I’ve bought on Amazon and both times the tablet stops charging after one year. The first tablet Amazon kindly replaced free of charge because it may have just been a defect and Samsung was not responding to my calls. I hardly used it so I would expect it to last at least a couple to three years. When it did perform it was great but I cannot recommend it because life span is only one year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The tablet is great. I love its ease of use
customer_reviews.text: The tablet is great. I love its ease of use. Wish the manual could have been part of info already loaded though as it took awhile to find the right one on the internet and then download it to the tablet. I also purchased a case and blue tooth keyboard as I'm not a one finger typist, and I found the keyboard too sensitive and small for my finger strokes. I also like the speaking feature and have used it when the tablet has been separated by the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Decent tablet with some flaws
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent tablet for the price i mainly use the device to read my books and download documents from my classes. If you do plan to buy one, be wary of the problem that samsung hasn't fixed which is the charger port starts to fail after awhile. Apparently, Samsung hasn't fixed this problem its a known issue. To get around the issue you can opt to put something underneath the micro usb part to keep it charging. But you shouldn't have to do all that to get a tablet to work so i rate it 3 stars. Pros. low price point . Pretty good device for entertainment use. cons: issues with charging port.
customer_reviews.author: Carl brown

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a cheap tablet after my ipad mini started ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a cheap tablet after my ipad mini started to have ghosting issues and was considering the fire HD7 and the tab4. After using the tab4 for a week I noticed the battery dies daily and it was no where mear as fast as my 4 year ipad mini. I regret buying and wish I had bought thr Fire 7 as it was much cheaper and I only bought it so my 3 yr old can play games.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet but could use larger internal memory.
customer_reviews.text: Cant fine much wrong with the tablet. There have been a few apps that weren't compatible with the tablet but they are rare. The only thing I wish it had was a larger internal memory. Even with an additional 64 gig micro SD card it still wasn't enough. Many of the tablets functions & apps cant be stored on external memory so you still reply on the small amount of internal memory that the tablet provides.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Nasbitt

customer_reviews.title: Its great ...but needs flash player...
customer_reviews.text: We use it so the kids can get online to download their homework and do some online work. They also get bonus time to play. We thought a long time about which tablet to get. The value was important but also the microSD slot so we can store more data and not always be dependent on the cloud - which does not exist everywhere. I have a kindle and apple devices and pc's and bought 2 of these and they fit well into our overall tech needs. The only issue is that we often need flash player to do some online work and to make use of some websites - which is not supported.
customer_reviews.author: h r b

customer_reviews.title: Solid.
customer_reviews.text: I still have this (came out in 2014). It works well for YouTube and kindle. However, pokemon go doesn't work well on it or any other games. It has a better battery life than any other tablet that I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: updates are easy and automatic
customer_reviews.text: item works well. updates are easy and automatic. many apps that can be downloaded. battery can last for days in stand by mode. however this device cant be used for receiving amazon prime content which i didn't know and was part of the reason I had bought this item. Also email are slower to be received on this item compared to how soon I get them on my computer or phone. Netflix and hula can be view through this item if you have accounts with them.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Parker

customer_reviews.title: No IR Blaster knock off charger, russian booklets?!
customer_reviews.text: So maybe i missed something, but my tab doesmt have an ir blaster, and when i got it everything was in russian, and i got some knock off charger and cables. I think i got jiped, but the tablet works fine from whst i can tell. Just a little disapointed its aparently different than every other tab 4 on earth because of the lack of an ir blaster.
customer_reviews.author: John David Walker

customer_reviews.title: Entertainment 1-click away!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Tab G-4. Tab is working great, I do a lot of browsing on it where ever WI-FI is available and email check too. Between my cell and my tab I am never to far from my communications. Works well and does exactly what it was design to do. Apps are right including some of very own. I was at the Airport on a delay for a few hours and I was able to connect to Wi-Fi and enjoy my digital movies on VUDU.COM, a plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: R. Salcedo

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy TAB4
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift to my SO, she was delighted with the back-lighting. But was a little perturbed by how sensitive the touch screen really is. We adjusted the screen to suit her liking and she was very happy with the gift. Everything functioned as advertised. I also increased the memory/storage to 32GB by adding a micro SanDisk Ultra. The extra memory loaded as advertised and the system even configured it all on its own too.
customer_reviews.author: WingMan112001

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the 150 I paid for it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet. It's great for my games but it is also great for me to use for college. I was able to download Microsoft word, powerpoint, and excel on it. It makes my school work mobile for me and it's a hell of a lot lighter than a laptop. It also fits in my purse which is great for traveling too. I love that it isn't big and bulky and it's very easy to use. I just love it! I knew I would because I am also using a Samsung galaxy 4 phone. :)
customer_reviews.author: shonda754913

customer_reviews.title: Good entry level Android tablet
customer_reviews.text: This does NOT have the ability to screen mirror as said in the description, which was my reason for the purchase. I was able to use the AllCast app to send specific media but I would much rather share the whole screen. Other than that it works fine as an entry level table. I will give it four stars for that reason otherwise it would have three.
customer_reviews.author: Bonni McO

customer_reviews.title: No Product Reliability
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son as a gift. No issues with performance or functionality. However, experienced problems charging the tablet after a year. Charging for 24 hrs got the battery to 30-35% of capacity. Replaced the battery assuming it may have been the problem. The NEW battery would typically charge to about 50% (did manage to get it fully charged 1 time) and no further. Now, it does not charge or even power up when plugged in. A product with a life of just over a year is a complete FAILURE. Do NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Branko Turcich

customer_reviews.title: You  should  get  the  16gig  at  the  least . It's  great  other  wise !
customer_reviews.text: Works great . Haven't had a problem with it . I just should've got the 16gig at least . I have a SD card . A lot of apps won't move to the SD card . I only use my laptop when I need some weird hardware like DVD or ethernet cable or to print now . I have an older printer . It's not wireless . The tablet will work with a lot of wireless printers .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great as an e-reader
customer_reviews.text: My nook was starting to die, and I wanted an e-reader that would allow me to purchase both nook and kindle books. This tablet is perfect for my needs. I use a MacBook Pro for work, so I didn't need a tablet that does tons of stuff. All I use the tablet for is e-books. I like that I can pick different page colors - white, sepia or green, change font size, and change brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought a refurbished version of this tablet for my mother. It works like brand new, very fast, very nice looking, and very easy for her to use. I am very satisfied with. The speakers and cameras are good, and the screen is bright and displays videos and images beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Kapil Singh

customer_reviews.title: Two Months Old and Problem Already
customer_reviews.text: At first, it all seemed fine; [well, not all, I disliked the fact that the back button did not light up in the dark (like it does on other Samsung model tabs and on Samsung phones)]. Then suddenly, the headphone jack stopped working. After eliminating other potential issues, I contacted Samsung, who advised a factory reset. That did not work. Cut to the ending, the tablet is being packaged and returned to the service center. Note: this is a tablet that has been babied in the two months of its life. Apparently this headphone jack problem is a common problem, as I have discovered through research.
customer_reviews.author: KCA

customer_reviews.title: early birthday gift for myself.
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to this tablet from my nook hd+ and I am sooo happy I did. the battery life is amazing, a full charge lasts about 2 or 3 days depending on how much I use it. I bought it to take with me on trips so I wouldn't have to lug my computer around, and its basically just a much larger version of my phone (galaxy s3) I would recommend this over a nook any day. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Marshall-Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy Tab is Great for Travel
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Android tablet. Works like any other tablet or better. My only reason for giving it a 4 star is because I didn't read reviews from,others that warned about the sound. Sometimes out of the blue the sound in the sound Jack blows out like the sound blew out the speakers and then you can barely hear the sound. This has only happened while listening to music with headphones BUT with a simple s*** down and restart of the tablet the sound works again. Has only happened 3x but thats enough to upset anyone. Other than that there are no other issues with this tablet. It is great quality and amazing style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but Google Nexus is faster.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Samsung Galaxy since my Google nexus charging port went bad, it would be $70 to replace it. The Galaxy didn't have as much processing speed as the nexus, but i figured it would be about the same speed since the nexus has a 1.5 GHz processor and the Galaxy has a 1.2 GHz processor. Just using it for a week, there was a difference. Just opening snap chat, camera, and opening apps, the Galaxy was a bit slow. I only gave it a 4 star since the processor speed was slower and less convenient than my previous tablet. The Galaxy does have a sleek design though.
customer_reviews.author: Wade B.

customer_reviews.title: From now on, Samsung all the way!
customer_reviews.text: After fighting for months with my Nexus 7 legacy 2012, this Samsung tablet has been a blessing. Regardless of all the updates that Google did, countless factory resets, trying different performance improving apps, I came very close to throw my Google Nexus 7 against the wall. This Samsung Tab 4 7", right out of the box, worked like a dream!
customer_reviews.author: Edward C. Burckhardt

customer_reviews.title: Great Samsung tablet
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in 2014 and it's still in great condition and works 100%
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Battery life could use some improvement, but overall it is a great little tablet. It is a good size, and it easily fits in a briefcase or purse. I bought one for my husband, and he, too, is happy with the size. It is easily held and used with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Dani-gal

customer_reviews.title: gift for Grandpa
customer_reviews.text: Quick setup, gift for my 90 yr old father in law, he is getting accustomed to it, although it is very intuitive, modern technology is always a challenge(for any of us, lol). I have a Samsung S5 so it has similar commands and functionalilty. He's up and running and seems to navigate freely. He has a few questions and my son is here to help him, too. I would highly recommend. It will only be used with wifi.
customer_reviews.author: MitsuJones

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife as a "just because" gift. She has a Samsung Galaxy S4, so it was super natural for her to start using this item. She likes it. I'm a techy guy, and I like this tablet. It works well and I haven't found anything I dislike about it. I got an Otterbox for it, because my wife is prone to dropping her devices. They pair nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Fennig

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet I've owned!
customer_reviews.text: I have recently purchased this tablet to replace my galaxy tab 2 7.0. I am completely satisfied with this. It's light, speedy, and over all the best gallery I've used to date. Glad Samsung dropped the proprietary charging plug. I installed yahoo Aviate launcher and that is smooth and very nice as well. I would definitely but this tablet again!
customer_reviews.author: ToTalXS

customer_reviews.title: love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I'm loving my new tab!! Its been 2 weeks already and I can't say one bad thing about it. It runs smoothly, looks awsomee and I added a 64gb external memory card and it works super. No lags or freezing at all. It worked just fine without the external memory, its not obligated to buy it, I just did because I like to download lots of music and movies.. But I can say that I am 100% super happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: BVivi

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It was a handy little device while I had it. The internet speeds were highly decent and I enjoyed its design. I mainly used it for an alarm or for very light browsing, which is why I let it go since a phone does the very same thing (plus I have a chromebook now which achieves even better browsing).
customer_reviews.author: P.D.

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 (7-Inch, White)
product_meta.description:
Color:White| Style:Tablet

AT A GLANCE:
 * High-resolution, 7.0-inch display for vivid detail
 * Read e-books, watch movies, play games, browse the web, and more
 * IR blaster allows you to use tablet as universal remote
 * Search TV listings and receive recommendations
 * Share your tablet with multi-user mode
 * Switch to Kids Mode for a colorful, easy-to-use interface
 * Rear and front cameras for photos and video chat
 * Add up to 32 GB memory with microSD slot
 * Easily multitask with two apps using Multi Window
 * Lightweight, portable design

CRISP, CLEAR DISPLAY FOR HOURS OF IMMERSIVE ENTERTAINMENT
BRILLIANT, HIGH-RESOLUTION DISPLAY FOR EXCEPTIONAL DETAIL
Ideal for reading, playing games, browsing the web, or watching movies, the Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 features a 7.0-inch, 1280x800 resolution screen, so you experience rich graphics, bright colors, and crisp text.

RECEIVE PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATIONS WITH WATCHON
The WatchON feature lets you type in your zip code and cable provider to browse and search current TV listings and get personalized recommendations based on your viewing history.

FUNCTIONS AS A UNIVERSAL REMOTE CONTROL
The Galaxy Tab 4 has a built-in IR blaster, which allows you to use the tablet as a universal remote control.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR PREFERENCES AND SHARE YOUR EXPERIENCES
SHARE YOUR TABLET WITH MULTI-USER MODE
Great for sharing your tablet with family members, multi-user mode lets you add up to eight profiles. This allows up to eight different users to log in separately, so you each see only your own apps, backgrounds, and email.

KIDS MODE OFFERS A CHILD-FRIENDLY INTERFACE
Create a separate profile for your kids and switch to Kids Mode--a child-friendly interface that is fun and easy to control. Parents can track the time their kids spend and even set preferences to manage which features their children can access.

BUILT-IN CAMERAS FOR PHOTOS AND VIDEO CHAT
Equipped with a 3-megapixel rear camera and a 1.3-megapixel front camera, the Galaxy Tab 4 lets you take photos and video chat with friends and family members.

Personalize your experience with separate logins. View Larger.

Use two apps at once on the same screen. View Larger.

EXPANDABLE MEMORY AND EASY MULTITASKING
LIGHTWEIGHT, PORTABLE DESIGN
At only 0.35 inches thick and weighing .61 pounds, the Galaxy Tab 4 is comfortable to hold and convenient to take with you wherever you go.

EXPANDABLE MEMORY TO STORE PHOTOS, MUSIC, AND VIDEOS
The tablet offers 8 GB of onboard memory and includes a microSD card slot that allows you to add up to 32 GB of additional memory, making it easy to store more songs, videos, photos, and games.

USE TWO APPLICATIONS AT ONCE
With the Multi Window feature, you can place two applications side by side and drag content from one app to the other. You can even open the same app twice, which is handy if you're writing two email messages or want to reference two websites side by side.

FREE CONTENT WITH GALAXY PERKS
COMES WITH SIRIUS XM, DROPBOX STORAGE, AND MORE
With Galaxy Perks you'll receive free content and services, including three months of SiriusXM Internet Radio for new users, three audiobooks from Audible for new users, 50 GB of Dropbox space, and more.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 7.0, USB charging cable, wall adapter, and quick start guide.

Take photos with a 3-megapixel rear camera. View Larger.



AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Android 4.4 Kit Kat OS, 1.2 GHz quad-core processor
8 GB Flash Memory, 1.5 GB RAM Memory
32GB of memory available through a microSD slot and 50GB of free Dropbox storage
Comes with over $300 of free content and services
Wi-Fi Tablet, Android 4.4 Kit Kat OS, 1.2 GHz quad-core processor
8 GB Internal Memory, 1.5 GB RAM Memory
Camera resolution (Front): 1.3MP; Camera resolution (Rear): 3.0MP; WXGA TFT Display (1280x800 Resolution)
External Memory Card Capacity: microSD (Up to 32GB)
Battery Type: 3.8 Volt, Lithium Ion, 4000 mAh

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars6,198 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
